id.description: The unique identifier for the schedule

intervals.description: List of time intervals within the schedule

start_time.description: The start time of a specific interval

end_time.description: The end time of a specific interval

time_zone.description: The time zone in which the schedule operates

created_at.description: The date and time when the schedule was created

updated_at.description: The date and time when the schedule was last updated
